boardgame.name: Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies: Guadalcanal
Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies: Guadalcanal
Axis and Allies: Guadalcanal
boardgame.description: From Wizards website:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A sweeping conflict in the South Pacific where naval might leads to air superiority. Axis and Allies: Guadalcanal challenges you to control sea zones and island groups while managing troop and supply transport and directing land, sea, and air forces in one of the decisive campaigns of the Second World War's Pacific Theater._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Created by Larry Harris, designer of the Axis and Allies board game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Incorporates crucial elements that were key factors in the historical campaign, such as air strip construction, troop and supply transport, and furious land, sea, and air battles._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Introduces the Cruiser unit as well as mechanics for land, sea and air combat in the South Pacific using a randomized casualties system._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Provides fans with the historical counterpoint to the World War II experience offered by Axis and Allies: Battle of the Bulge._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Note the following errata from the AH website:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The rulebook states that players get 5 reinforcement points, plus 2 per island they control. This is incorrect due to an error in the rulebook. The correct reinforcement scheme is that each player gets 10 reinforcement, plus 4 per island they control. The game is playable either way, but Avalon Hill recommends playing the correct way (10 and 4 per). We are sorry for any inconvenience this causes._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Brand new and factory sealed! Gamers_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; Inn is a real store in Mesa AZ, and will ship via DHL Ground or the USPS. Most games will ship for $7.50 unless it is particularly light or heavy, or if you request Priority or special handling. Insurance is available on all orders for about $2. All games can ship international, and we will quote costs upon request. Delivery confirmation goes with every order. We do our best to give an accurate description of condition, and will ship them safely and quickly, and we will gladly combine shipping costs. In store pickup _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; payment is available with no shipping or handling charges. Arizona residents must pay 7.5% sales tax. About us: We can be reached at: info@gamersinnaz.com The store is open 24/7/365 and can be phoned at: 480-507-0509 Street address: 1232 E Southern Ave, Mesa, AZ 85204 You can check out our history as a Power Seller on eBay at: http://myworld.ebay.com/gamers_inn or on Amazon: http://www.amazon.com/gp/shops/index.html/104-7806078-3093525?ie=UTF8_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;sellerID=A2M6J42JR1XQD Our home page: http://www.gamersinnaz.com

Avalon Hill (WOC 957740000) A Sweeping Conflict Where Military Forces Struggle for Control of the Solomon Islands August 1942: The Solomon Islands Japan occupies the Solomon Islands, interfering with Allied supply lines in the South Pacific. In a surprise attack, the Americans capture Guadalcanal and its invaluable airstrip. As the Imperial Navy struggles to regain and strengthen its hold on the Solomons, the U.S. must press its counterattack in order to seize control of the island chain. Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies Guadalcanal challenges you to command a fleet of ships, direct aircraft, and deploy ground forces in order to dominate the enemy in one of the crucial campaigns of World War II. Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies Guadalcanal is designed for two players and can be played in two to three hours. Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies Guadalcanal is the fifth Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies variant, following the successful Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies D-Day, Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies Europe, Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies Pacific and Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies Battle of the Bulge versions. Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies Guadalcanal contains: 1 Game Board 1 Battle Box 172 Combat Unit Playing Pieces 70 Plastic Chips 20 Supply Tokens 16 Advantage Tokens 12 Dice 9 Airfield Markers 6 Control Markers 2 Base Cards 2 Victory-Point Markers 2 Reference Charts 1 First-Player Token 1 Storage Tray 1 Rulebook

CLS Games - Atlanta_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Boardgame Warehouse - is the largest retailer of board games in metro Atlanta! All games are new _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; still in factory shrink-wrap. AXIS _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; ALLIES GUADALCANAL: $30.95 Avalon Hill [WOC 95774] SHIPPING Continental U.S. - FedEx: $12.95 International (Including AK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; HI) - USPS Priority Mail: TBD
Buyer to pay $10.00 s/h in 48 states (UPS).
Complete and in great shape, played only once. Payment via PayPal or USPS money order. Shipping is $12. Combine shipping on multiple games.

Very nice shape, no issues, only set up but never played. Should be a 4 pound package from zip 80015, but actual weight might vary by a pound at most after packing. I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t charge for packing/handling, and I ship USPS Priority by the lowest rate, which is often Flat Rate, but sometimes games don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t fit in those boxes. Please let me know if you have questions.

AXIS _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; ALLIES DICE! Add an Edge to your Game with these Field Marshal Games EXCLUSIVE COMBAT DICE. Highest quality and Custom crafted with the Military insignia of each major combatant Nation of the Second World War. The Perfect Edition to your Favorite Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies Strategy War Game. Each National Set includes 6 Dice each! Complete set includes 6 UK Dice, 6 Germany Dice, 6 USA Dice, 6 USSR Dice and 6 Japan Dice... A total of 30 DICE!!!
Reserved for Magnus the Blue.
